Package guitrisentis

Here we find the graphical user interface for the Trisentis game and sigma game on grids.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
TriAnalyseToolBar The ToolBar for beginning to analyze the Trisentis game.
TriMSPOption As subclass of MSPOption this class implements the display of a result of an operation.
TrisentisBoard This class represents the graphical representation of a game board for the Trisentis game or the game on a grid.
TriToolBar This ToolBar is a part of the Trisentis examination framework.
TwoMatrixPanel Shows to matrixes above each other or on the left and the right.
 

Package guitrisentis Description

Here we find the graphical user interface for the Trisentis game and sigma game on grids. The abstract classes of package gui are implemented for this case.
